name: Kathrin Brinkmann
background: Kathrin Brinkmann serves as Commissioning Editor, Documentaries at ZDF. Focus areas: Society, culture, arts. They are looking for: Character-driven society docs; arts/culture docs with broad appeal.
thematic_priorities: Character-driven documentaries exploring contemporary German society
Political documentaries with strong journalistic integrity
International documentaries with German relevance or co-production elements
Arts and culture documentaries with broad appeal
History documentaries with high production values and cinematic approach
Science programming with engaging presentation and visual storytelling
Natural history with innovative visual approaches
format_specifications: Singles (45 minutes) or multi-part series (2–3 episodes)
Both, depending on story and slot
budget_parameters: Documentary: €120K–€250K per hour; Specialist Factual: €150K–€350K per hour
submission_process: Clear indication of ZDF slot (e.g., Terra X, ZDF History, etc.)
Two-page treatment with premise, approach and storytelling elements
additional_info: Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen. Encouragement of sustainable production practices. Support for projects from across German regions.
